title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Game-Based Mathematics Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: In a mobile game environment, learners will solve basic math problems (fractions, ratios, equations) with 80% accuracy using problem-solving strategies.
Through the game's feedback system, learners will self-diagnose and address learning gaps.
Learners will maintain learning continuity by completing all weekly game missions (5 topics) at 100%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
